description: Priority files for learning parapet and CMU wall details
instructions: Open these files in Revit one at a time. Use MCP to extract detail components, annotations, and dimensions.

learning_files.path: D:\Revit Detail Libraries\Revit Details\01 - Roof Details\PARAPET WALL DTL.rvt
learning_files.why: Main parapet detail - exactly what user was teaching

learning_files.path: D:\Revit Detail Libraries\Revit Details\01 - Roof Details\PARAPET AND TERRACE WALL COPING.rvt
learning_files.why: Coping detail - cap profile the user showed

learning_files.path: D:\Revit Detail Libraries\Revit Details\01 - Roof Details\ROOF_1-PLY PARAPET WALL WITH COPING.rvt
learning_files.why: Complete parapet assembly with roofing membrane

learning_files.path: D:\Revit Detail Libraries\Revit Details\01 - Roof Details\FLASHING @ HIGH PARAPET WALL.rvt
learning_files.why: Counter flashing and base flashing detail

learning_files.path: D:\Revit Detail Libraries\Revit Details\01 - Roof Details\ROOF FLASHING @ PARAPET WALL COPING.rvt
